meaningMnemonic: Under a <radical>roof</radical>, but still in the <radical>sun</radical>, a <radical>woman</radical> is laying out a fabulous <kanji>banquet</kanji>. The woman doesn't want anyone to burn from the sun, but banquets are best outside, so she's set up a roof to protect her and her guests.
readingMnemonic: Unfortunately, the <kanji>banquet</kanji> roof comes crashing down right before the guests arrive, and it <reading>end</reading>s (えん) before it can start.
